mapper.sql: select ol.oper_id, ol.title, ol.business_type, ol.method, ol.request_method, ol.operator_type, ol.user_id, ol.dept_name, ol.oper_url, ol.oper_ip, ol.oper_param, ol.json_result, ol.status, ol.error_msg, ol.oper_time, u.user_name as user_name, u.nick_name as user_nick from sys_oper_log ol left join sys_user u on u.user_id = ol.user_id left join sys_post p on p.post_id = u.post_id left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id = u.dept_id
mapper.insert: insert into sys_oper_log(title, business_type, method, request_method, operator_type, user_id, dept_name, oper_url, oper_ip, oper_param, json_result, status, error_msg, oper_time, tenant_id) values (#{title}, #{businessType}, #{method}, #{requestMethod}, #{operatorType}, #{userId}, #{deptName}, #{operUrl}, #{operIp}, #{operParam}, #{jsonResult}, #{status}, #{errorMsg}, sysdate(), #{enterpriseId})
